entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
